page.name: Bare Metal Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Bare Metal Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Bare Metal Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Bare Metal Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [RBX2][Storage] - Datastores unreachable
incidents.message: Please note the incident on Following all the necessary information. Start time: 05/03/2022 18:57 UTC End time: 05/03/2022 19:06 UTC User impact : ssd-000286, ssd-000290, ssd-000455, ssd-000456, ssd-000522, ssd-000668, ssd-000681, ssd-001611 Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2D Scope of impact : Datastores inacessible Root cause : Hardware issue on master node Comment : The failover mechanism was blocked after master node failed, we imported the service on slave node Thank you for your understanding OVHcloud Technical team
